comments:
Build I20021015.

For the build submission I tagged org.eclipse.jface.text in my workspace as 
version V20021016. Everything seemed to work fine. The build failed because the 
version was incomplete. (Compare v20021015 and v20021016) Looking into my log 
revealed the following exception:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.listeners.TagListener.errorLine
(TagListener.java:50)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Request.executeRequest
(Request.java:180)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.doExecute
(Command.java:393)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command$1.run
(Command.java:325)
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder.internalRun
(EclipseFolder.java:322)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder.access$1
(EclipseFolder.java:317)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder$2.run
(EclipseFolder.java:294)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run
(Workspace.java:1378)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder.run
(EclipseFolder.java:290)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.execute
(Command.java:336)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Tag.execute(Tag.java:74)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider.tag
(CVSTeamProvider.java:734)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.actions.TagAction$2.run
(TagAction.java:95)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:98)

There was a bug in yesterdays integration build. I have fixed it for todays 
build. You will probably need to use a previous build to perform your tagging.

On further investigation it appears that the NPE should only occur if there was 
an error in the tag operation to begin with, which is why there were no test 
case failures.
